commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: One, two, three, four! One, two... Eep!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are you okay?! Looks like you're still struggling with that part of the new dance.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Yeah... Ugh, sorry! Here you are, coming to see my practice, and I can't even show you what I'm doing right.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It doesn't bother me at all. Anyway, why don't you try making wider steps? I think the reason you're tripping is because you're not giving yourself enough space.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Okay. I just need to make wider steps. Lemme try!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: One, two, three, four! One, two, three... Hey! I did it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Woohoo! Let's try it again. You wanna focus on keeping your legs spread far enough apart...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, Ruby! Hey girls!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Hello.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Hey there!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Why, hello there, zura. It's so nice of you to come to Uchiura.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks. You guys all on your way home?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Sure are. We practiced SO much today!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Our new dance is finally starting to come together now.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: That's right! Ruby's doing especially well. She had so much trouble with one of her steps, but now she never messes up!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's great, Ruby!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: *Giggle* Yeah!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really? I'm so glad! Sounds like you've really gotten the hang of it, then!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Yup. I can even do it at the same speed as everyone else!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I hear you were assisting her in her personal training. Please accept my gratitude.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You don't need to thank me. I wanted to be there. Besides, I'm more than happy just knowing I was able to help Ruby.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, Ruby, your hair's a bit messed up. Probably from all that dancing. I've got a comb, so lemme fix it for you. Hold still.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Oh, um. Okay.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: *Giggle* You look like a porcelain doll when you sit still like that, Ruby.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Eek!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, Ruby? Would you be interested in modeling again?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Modeling?! Did the people from the crafting magazine ask me to?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No, no. It's just that one of the girls in my club, Karin, is an amateur model.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I guess she's found a bunch of magazines she thinks you could model for. This time, I'm thinking fashion!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: F-Fashion?! I couldn't!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You could, though! They're looking specifically for girls in our age range. I just know you'll make a huge splash!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All sorts of people would get to know about you and Aqours! So how about it, Ruby? I'll be there the whole time, so give it a try!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Whoaaa! Wait, just wait a second!
